item.description:
We have only a few seats left ~ please RSVP today if you want to attend this amazing workshop!


In the silence of our collective heart, women all over the world are listening and responding to this summons, to make a difference, to shape our communities in ways that honor our connection to the Earth and therefore to each other. We are calling a gathering of women to become a circle with a “leader in every chair.”


The vision that grounds this gathering is the creation of an inter-generational and interdisciplinary learning community that supports each person’s summons in order to co-create the best possible future, and cultivate a community that lives the “spirituality of hospitality” and cooperation.


Birute Regine, author of “Iron Butterflies: Women Transforming Themselves and the World,” will guide you through the process of composing your stories, where you will listen to your wisdom. Each person will co-create the story of her summons/call with others, a story to be shared at the end of our time together… a story to take home, live fully, for becoming the leader you are. It will be a time for planting the seeds of the future.


We will gather Saturday September 11 from 8:30 am-5:00 pm and reconvene on Sunday Sept 12 from 8:30am-12:00 pm at the beautiful Larches Inn, 26 South Main St Carver MA 02330


The fee is $150. Morning snacks are included each day and lunch on Saturday. Please bring a journal, your favorite art materials. Wear comfortable clothes. Preregistration required by September 7.


Please contact Rain Philips rainhphilips@yahoo.com 508 866 9228 or Birute Regine at
biruteregine@comcast.net



“Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.”
item.name: Workshop: Iron Butterflies: Women Transforming Themselves and the World
